title: Goldsworth Park Lake Walking Route

images.title: Goldsworth Park Lake by Jon Combe, CC BY-SA 2.0 <https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/2.0>, via Wikimedia Commons
images.caption: Goldsworth Park Lake 1

images.title: Ron Strutt / Goldsworth Park lake
images.caption: Goldsworth Park Lake 2. The lake was created to drain what was a rather swampy area of ground so that it could be built on. The fact that it provided a community amenity was a by-product!

description: Enjoy a short stroll around the lake in this pretty park in Woking. The lake has a well surfaced walking path around its perimeter and attracts a variety of birdlife - look out for coot, geese, great crested grebe and mandarin duck. Horsell Common is only about a mile away and is a good option if you would like to continue your walk.

details.subtitle: Further Information and Other Local Ideas
details.content: For more walking ideas in the area see the Surrey Walks page.
